name: Dismantler
description:
Full launch forecast: 01/01/2022

Simple graphics in pixel art style
Very satisfying physical interactions with parts and equipment.
Why on early access?
We want to collect player feedback to finish game development

Game modes

Infinite mode: Manage an electronics store and expand your business areas until you become the largest company in that area.
Story mode: Play a young man who makes the toughest decisions for the good of those he loves. Take on a variety of jobs throughout the series, from a simple boy who dismantles devices to a dangerous gang boss. Learn to make decisions carefully, the end of the story may come sooner than planned. Free gameplay that allows different possibilities to advance the story. It's up to you to figure out the best decision to make.
